ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will go back and forth between fire and scalding water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will go round and around between it and boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will keep circling around between Hell and boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will run around in blazing fire and boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They shall keep going back and forth between it and the extremely hot boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will go between it and Hamim An!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Round about shall they go between it and hot, boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: they shall go round between it and between hot, boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They go circling round between it and fierce, boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They will go round between its flames and boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Going round between it and balling water fierce.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They shall circuit between it and boiling hot water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will go between it (Hell) and the boiling hot water!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: they shall go round between it, and between a hot, boiling water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They circulate between it and between a seething bath.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:44] They shall pass round, they shall pace, between it and boiling hot water, [water] of extreme temperature, which they are given to drink every time they call to be rescued from the heat of the Fire (ānin is defective, like qādin).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They go circling round between it) i.e. the Fire (and fierce, boiling water) water as hot as can be.
